titleStmt.title: The papists new-fashion'd allegiance a letter lately seiz'd in the house of an eminent Roman Catholick in Hereford-shire, and produced at the late assizes there held / written by Father Harcourt.
titleStmt.author: Barrow, William, 1610-1679.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
